page_content:
Methanol is increasingly being used 
around the world in innovative 
applications to meet our growing 
energy demand.
Methanol is Essential 
for Everyday Life
~3 million tonnes
Potential annual methanol marine fuel 
demand by 2027. See page 34.SHIPPING FUEL
As a cleaner-
burning marine fuel, 
methanol can reduce 
emissions of SO× and 
PM by more than 
95 per cent, NO× by 
up to 80 per cent, and 
CO₂ from combustion 
by up to 15 per cent.
METHANOL IS: 
 ▪Biodegradable 
 ▪Compliant with 
stringent emissions 
regulations 
 ▪Cost competitive 
with ultra low 
sulphur fuel
125 PORTS
Available at more 
than 125 of the 
world’s largest ports
